message: Hi Bob, let's start with a 60/40 split.  It's a good deal for you to get things going.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, as it's closer to a 50/50 split.  Let's get this game started!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I came down a little. We're losing money with each round!
I'm willing to go up to 55/45, but I think we should be aiming for a more even split.  We're both losing money with each round!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'll take a slight hit to end this.  Take it or leave it - we're both losing money!
